snippet.title: Layers Deep Gameplay teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Kickstarter trailer for Layers Deep. A Metroidvania about an Onion lost in a southern-gothic world. The Kickstarter is going live May 20th, please give the page a follow here: 
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/tallordergames/layers-deep
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2870250/Layers_Deep/
Here's our press kit as well: https://impress.games/press-kit/tall-order-games/layers-deep
We have been using Godot to make this game for the past year and all of our hard work if finally coming to fruition. This is our dream indie game and were so excited to be working with Over the Garden Wall composers The Blasting Company.
